categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military bases

nodes.text: The Fandélane Rebel base was a facility used by the Alliance to Restore the Republic at some point following the Battle of Yavin. That base was under the command of the Twi'lek Alliance Colonel Ki Essorel.
The Fandélane Rebel base only appeared in Les démons de feu, a roleplaying adventure published in the 25th issue of French gaming magazine Graal.
